{"id":1527786804,"question_id":3714,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 days, 22 hours","timestamp":1738433779,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"272 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1527786804/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum and Minimum Sums of at Most Size K Subsequences","memory":"192.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int M = 1e9+7;\npublic:\n    int minMaxSums(vector<int>& nums, int k) { //1 <= k <= min(70, nums.length)\n        int n = nums.size();\n        long long ans = 0;\n        vector<vector<int>> ncr(n+1, vector<int>(k+1, 0)); //n choose r\n        ncr[0][0] = 1;\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++) {\n            ncr[i][0] = 1;\n            for(int r=1; r<=k; r++) {\n                ncr[i][r] = (ncr[i-1][r-1]+ncr[i-1][r])%M;\n            }\n        }\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            for(int sz = 1; sz<=k; sz++) {\n                long long minContrib = ((long long)nums[i]*ncr[n-i-1][sz-1])%M; //nums[i] as the min\n                long long maxContrib = ((long long)nums[i]*ncr[i][sz-1])%M; //nums[i] as the max\n                ans = (ans+minContrib+maxContrib)%M;\n            }\n        }\n        return int(ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-and-minimum-sums-of-at-most-size-k-subsequences","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
